Articles.Content: i failed to rescue the sun from exploding into a supernova
I fail to stop jeb from smashing kerbin into the sun.
I failed to explain to Jeb that crash landing at 600 metres per second with no fuel or landing legs is not good.
I failed to explain to Jeb that crash landing at 600 metres per second with no antimatter fuel or landing legs is not good.
I didn't bother explaining Jeb that crash landing at 600 metres per second with no antimatter fuel or landing legs is not good.
I did bother explaining Jeb that crash landing at 600 m/s with no fuel or landing legs is not good!
I explained Jeb that crash landing at 600 m/s with no fuel or landing legs is good!
I am who taught Jeb to only fear fear itself and that it does not matter one bit if you are crash landing because you are still getting back to Merlin and it will be the best rollercoaster ever!
